parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the client token.

parameters.name: role_name
parameters.description: The name of the token role.

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: A list of policies for the token.

parameters.name: meta
parameters.description: A map of string to string valued metadata.

parameters.name: no_parent
parameters.description: If true and set by a root caller, the token will not have the parent token of the caller.

parameters.name: no_default_policy
parameters.description: If true the default policy will not be contained in this token's policy set.

parameters.name: renewable
parameters.description: Set to false to disable the ability of the token to be renewed past its initial TTL.

parameters.name: ttl
parameters.description: The TTL period of the token, provided as "1h", where hour is the largest suffix.

parameters.name: explicit_max_ttl
parameters.description: If set, the token will have an explicit max TTL set upon it.

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: The display name of the token.

parameters.name: num_uses
parameters.description: The maximum uses for the given token.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: If specified, the token will be periodic;
